data.md:MetaData: Large Area Scan Macroscope images of ice core samples collected from the Alpine ice core VCL (2012)

Diameter: 3''. Institutes involved: Heidelberg University (D) Institute of Environmental Physics (leading institute),Department of Geography, University of Zurich. Drilling team: Heinrichi Rufli, Martin Hoelzle, Pascal Bohleber, Barbara May.
